title: Yuga Labs Partners With Somnia to Increase Metaverse Interoperability and Incentives
description: New York, NY, May 03, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Somnia, a high performance L1 blockchain and set of omni-chain protocols designed to scale the metaverse, partners with Yuga Labs, the creators of iconic Web3 projects like Bored Ape Yacht Club (BAYC) and the Otherside. Somniaâ€™s blockchain is optimized for gaming and the metaverse, with the potential to handle hundreds of millions of transactions per second, and its omni-chain protocols are designed to connect the metaverse, NFTs, and gaming ecosyst
